summary: This memo concerns Petros Moutsos, a former CIA informant in the communist-dominated Greek Maritime Organization (OENO). CIA is planning to have Moutsos travel to Cuba as a source of information and wants him to jump ship in New Orleans with INS approval. He will also attempt to contact his wife, Angela Boyer, who has a communist background, to improve his contacts in communist circles in Cuba.
title: CIA LIAISON MATERIAL
